metadata.synopsis: A brain jar's "radio chatter" can be psionically overheard by players passing by.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load up CTY_Main_Ago to -2007; -2; 211walk forwardwait for the AD to come up (will need previous ADs to finish)

0.speaker: Brain Jar
0.text: Disturbance at Wyrm's Crossing. Engaging now.
